Home » 15A1 Ekakanipātapāḷi » 18 Aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagga
18.82--91
Aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagga
463--472.
453Aniccasaññaṃ bhāveti…  anattasaññaṃ bhāveti…  maraṇasaññaṃ bhāveti…  āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ bhāveti…  sabbaloke anabhiratisaññaṃ bhāveti…  aṭṭhikasaññaṃ bhāveti…  puḷavakasaññaṃ bhāveti…  vinīlakasaññaṃ bhāveti…  vicchiddakasaññaṃ bhāveti…  uddhumātakasaññaṃ bhāveti… .
<< 18.72--81 up18.92--101 >>
